TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit InvalidConfigFileTypeException extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationErrorsException

Docs.summary: Occurs when an object supplied through an entry in the Web.config file is missing or invalid.

remarks.format: ## Remarks See [Web.config Settings for ReportViewer](../Topic/Web.config%20Settings%20for%20ReportViewer.md) for more information.
